name: Lamia Priestess

specials.name: Emblazoned Armament
specials.description: Falchion serves as holy symbol. +1 status bonus to damage using the Falchion (already included)

specials.name: Shield
specials.description: Casts shield whenever they have a 3rd action free

specials.name: Shield Block
specials.description: Hardness 15 from shield spell. Once used cannot be used again for 10 minutes.

specials.name: Lamia's Caress
specials.description: The lamia touches a creature, who must succeed at a DC [dc] Will save or become stupefied 1. If the target fails additional saves against this ability, the condition value increases by 1 (to a maximum of stupefied 4). This condition value decreases by 1 every 24 hours.

specials.name: Athletic Rush
specials.description: Duration 1 round. Your body fills with physical power and skill. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to Speed and a +2 status bonus to Athletics checks. As a part of Casting this Spell, you can use a Stride, Leap, Climb, or Swim action. The spell's bonuses apply during that action. This uses one of her 2 focus points.

specials.name: Enduring Might
specials.description: Trigger An attack or effect would deal damage to you. Effect You gain resistance 13 against all damage from the triggering attack or effect. This uses one of her 2 focus points.

specials.name: Harm (Directed Channel)
specials.description: When you cast a version of harm that has an area, you can optionally make its area a 60-foot cone instead of a 30-foot emanation.

specials.name: Cast Down
specials.description: If the next action you use is to cast harm or heal to damage one creature, the target is knocked prone if it takes any damage from the spell. If the target critically fails its save against the spell, it also takes a 10-foot status penalty to its Speed for 1 minute.

morespells.name: Divine
spells: Chilling Darkness (13d6 cold + counteract light spell), Finger of Death, Regenerate, Harm (x4)
Sending, Flame Strike (8d6 divine fire), Heal (5d8)
Air Walk, Dimensional Anchor, Freedom of Movement
Dispel Magic, See Invisibility, Spiritual Weapon
Detect Magic, Divine Lance (6d4+4 evil or chaotic), Message, Prestidigitation, Shield (hardness 15)
Illusory Disguise (at will), Illusory Object (at will), Ventriloquism (at will)

strikes.name: +2 Greater Striking Falchion
strikes.damage: 3d8+15 slashing (crit: target is flat footed until Lamias next turn)
